channel.title: front page :: Jose N Sosa
channel.description: Hi, thank you for checking out my site On this site, use the menu on the left to navigate all content. At the moment, I am currently focused on the Free RHCSA Course. I am hosting this website on Vultr Click the referral link to support!

item.title: RHCSA EX200 Course
item.description: List of all course material and videos free. Day 1: Intro How I Passed the RHCSA EX200 in 2024 Lab 1: Install Lab 2: Terminal and Command Syntax Lab 3: Directory Structure and Filesystem Lab 4: How to Get Help in Linux Lab 5: Working With Files & Directories Lab 6: Input Output Redirection
